mapper.select: SELECT * , COUNT(1) AS count , SUM(DC.contract_total_price) AS total , C.customer_name , CC.customer_company_name , G.goods_name , PS.set_name FROM doc_contract AS DC LEFT JOIN customer AS C ON DC.customer_id = C.customer_id LEFT JOIN customer_company AS CC ON DC.customer_id = CC.customer_id LEFT JOIN goods AS G ON DC.goods_code = G.goods_code LEFT JOIN price_set AS PS ON DC.set_code= PS.set_code GROUP BY DC.contract_code ORDER BY DC.contract_code DESC LIMIT ${firstClmn}, ${lastClmn}

SELECT COUNT(SQ.CNT) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM doc_contract AS DC LEFT JOIN customer AS C ON DC.customer_id = C.customer_id LEFT JOIN customer_company AS CC ON DC.customer_id = CC.customer_id LEFT JOIN goods AS G ON DC.goods_code = G.goods_code LEFT JOIN price_set AS PS ON DC.set_code= PS.set_code GROUP BY DC.contract_code ) AS SQ

SELECT * , C.customer_name , CC.customer_company_name , G.goods_name , PS.set_name , CC.customer_company_president , CC.customer_company_call , SG.set_goods_count , GFSG.goods_name AS setGoodsName FROM doc_contract AS DC LEFT JOIN customer AS C ON DC.customer_id = C.customer_id LEFT JOIN customer_company AS CC ON DC.customer_id = CC.customer_id LEFT JOIN goods AS G ON DC.goods_code = G.goods_code LEFT JOIN price_set AS PS ON DC.set_code= PS.set_code LEFT JOIN set_goods AS SG ON PS.set_code = SG.set_code LEFT JOIN goods AS GFSG ON SG.goods_code = GFSG.goods_code WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} ORDER BY DC.contract_code ASC
